alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 12:17PM EDT until August 12 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hardin County in west central Ohio... * Until 100 PM EDT. * At 1217 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alger, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Kenton, Ada, Alger, Blanchard, Roundhead, Mount Victory, Mcguffey, Patterson, Grant, Silver Creek, Jumbo, Huntersville, Pfeiffer, Walton, Hepburn, Mentzer and State Route 195 at State Route 235. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
